notes: Second generation full-size SUV. Built on Tundra platform sharing 5.7L V8 and chassis components. Larger than first generation with three-row seating for 7-8 passengers. TRD Sport and Limited trim levels available. 6-speed automatic became standard 2010. Timing belt replaced by timing chain on both engines. Data sourced from Wikipedia Toyota Sequoia article, January 2025 revision.
